data.title: Bachelor's in Information Systems
data.details: Currently pursuing a Bachelor's in Information Technology/Information Systems, gaining knowledge in software development, databases, networking, and software engineering.

data.title: Technical High School in Computer Science
data.details: Technical course in computer science focusing on hardware fundamentals, software, and networks.

data.title: Flutter Study
data.details: I am studying Flutter to enhance my mobile app development skills, exploring its capabilities and applicability in real-world projects.

data.title: Exploration of .NET
data.description: Learning back-end and expanding Full-Stack skills
data.details: I am exploring .NET to better understand back-end development and expand my Full-Stack skill set, focusing on building robust APIs and services.

data.title: React Projects
data.details: I have developed projects in React to deepen my understanding of the library and continue improving my skills in state management, components, and routing.

data.title: Vue.js Project
data.details: I am currently working on a project with Vue.js to enhance my experience with modern JavaScript frameworks and their integration with APIs.

data.title: Java Projects
data.details: I have small projects in Java, exploring the language and its applicability, especially in back-end systems and database integration.

data.title: Interest in Technology and Innovation
data.description: Developing personal projects and seeking innovation
data.details: I have a strong interest in developing personal projects to test new technologies and always seek to improve my skills in different areas of technology.

data.title: Working in Agile Teams
data.details: I am interested in working in agile teams (Scrum, Kanban) to contribute in collaborative and innovative environments, prioritizing continuous delivery and constant improvement.
